name: PixatoPress Lite
author: Jorgen Schetters, Kaspar Lenferink

sections.description:
PixatoPress allows you to create massive wallpaper sites using WordPress with just a few clicks. No more ony by one picture posting for creating wallpaper sites using WordPress. You can publish hundreds of wallpapers with just few click and it takes less than a minute.

Wallpaper sites are very popular and with the power of PixatoPress you can now become the proud owner of a massive wallpaper site in just few minutes.

Ultimate Plugin For Creating Massive Wallpaper Sites In Just Minutes

PixatoPress Lite Features:

  • Easy one click setup
  • Ability to upload hundreds of images with just one click
  • Ability to create individual posts with the uploaded images with just one click
  • Ability to quick generate content and tags based on keywords
  • No code modification or coding skills required

With the PixatoPress WordPress plugin you can now turn you WordPress blog into a powerful wallpaper site.

For more details please visit http://pixatopress.com/
sections.installation:
1. Upload PixatoPressLite folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
